Sentencas: Surface modification with nanoparticles has been widely studied to promote catalytic activity and stability of the oxygen electrode in solid oxide electrochemical cells (SOCs).
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: However, attaining uniformity and scalability of the nanoparticles remains a challenging endeavor.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: Herein, we developed a highly conductive nanosized Sm3+ and Nd3+ double-doped ceria decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta-Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (SNDC@LSCF-GDC) oxygen electrode via an ultrasonic spray infiltration technique.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: The uniform SNDC infiltrates promote oxygen catalytic activity by increasing oxygen vacancies and reaction sites on the surface of the electrode.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: The SOC with the SNDC@LSCF-GDC oxygen electrode shows high performance in fuel cell (1.97 W/cm2 at 750 degrees C) and electrolysis cell (1.72 A/cm2 at 750 degrees C) modes.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: Moreover, ultrasonic infiltration-based SNDC nanoparticles were successfully demonstrated in a large-size commercial cell (10 cm x 10 cm effective area), showing increased power output and remarkable stability for 960 h.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells

Sentencas: This work presents a scalable and feasible way to decorate large area electrodes with uniform infiltrates for energy storage and conversion applications.
Titulo: Uniform and scalable Sm3+and Nd3+doped ceria nanocatalysts decorating bifunctional oxygen electrodes for high performing reversible solid oxide electrochemical cells
